original_text: There some people brought to him a man who was deaf and could hardly talk, and they begged Jesus to place his hand on him.
korean_text: 사람들이 귀 먹고 말 더듬는 자를 데리고 예수께 나아와 안수하여 주시기를 간구하거늘

sentences.original_text: There some people brought to him a man
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 사람들이 그에게 한 남자를 데려왔는데

sentences.original_text: who was deaf and could hardly talk
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 귀먹었고 거의 말을 할 수 없었다

sentences.original_text: to place his hand on him
